data.title: Team Make Your Mark Virtual 6 Challenge
data.meta_description: Join Team Make Your Markâ„¢ and complete 6 miles in 6 days , whether you run, jog, hike, bike, paddle or swim, in any location you choose. 2025 Dates Coming Soon!
data.text:
How it Works

Step 1: Register and Join the Virtual Team

When you register for the Virtual 6 Challenge, your $36 registration comes with a Virtual 6 Challenge bandana, access to training plans and more. Register early and receive your registration swag by mail to wear for the Virtual 6 Challenge. Upon completion of your 6, all registered challengers will receive a finishers pack: a car magnet, sticker (for your water bottle) keychain and pin.*

Bonus: If you choose to fundraise and raise $250, earn a Team Make Your Mark race shirt to go along with your registration swag. Raise $250 by May 21st and have your shirt in time for V6 week!

Step 2: Choose Your Training Schedule

Here are some sample training plans to help you get started:

1 Mile Every Day

Build up to 2 Miles/ 3 Days

Challenge Yourself to 6 Miles on Day 6

Step 3: Get Connected and Join us on Strava.

Join the Virtual 6 Challenge group on Strava, the free online fitness tracker app that all Virtual 6 Challengers will be using to track miles and celebrate accomplishments. This is how we will know you completed the challenge!

https://www.strava.com/clubs/virtual6challenge

Step 4: Run, jog, walk, bike, swim, hike, or paddle your Virtual 6

ANYTIME and ANYWHERE during Virtual 6 Week

You can run, jog, bike, hike, walk, swim, or paddle your 6 miles anywhere and anytime during Virtual 6 Challenge Week. Choose somewhere that you feel safe like your neighborhood, treadmill, backyard, favorite trail- the options are endless.

What is the schedule for event week?

Join us for a Virtual Kick Off Ceremony Thursday, June 20th @ 8:15pm ET/ 5:15pm PT. Details to be emailed to all registrants.

How can I fundraise and raise awareness?

When you register, a fundraising page will be created for you. If you choose to fundraise, update the page with your story and start sharing through email, text and social media. Use our Virtual 6 Challenge Toolkit for lupus facts you can share while you fundraise, social shareables and fundraising guides to help you reach your fundraising goals and raise awareness.

Register Now

Have more questions?

Send an email to Stacey Clark at clark@lupus.org and let us know how we can help you get started.
